columns.driverStandingsId: The unique identifier for each driver standing entry.
columns.raceId: The unique identifier for the associated race event.
columns.driverId: The unique identifier for the participating driver.
columns.points: The total points earned by the driver in the season.
columns.position: The finishing position of the driver in the race.
columns.positionText: The text representation of the driver's finishing position.
columns.wins: The total number of race wins by the driver.

driverStandings.table_description: The table tracks driver standings across multiple races.

columns.constructorResultsId: The unique identifier for each constructor results entry.
columns.raceId: The unique identifier for the associated race event.
columns.constructorId: The unique identifier for the participating constructor.
columns.points: The total points earned by the constructor in the race.
columns.status: The completion status of the constructor in the race.

constructorResults.table_description: The table records results of constructors in various race events.

columns.qualifyId: The unique identifier for each qualifying entry.
columns.raceId: The unique identifier for the associated race event.
columns.driverId: The unique identifier for the participating driver.
columns.constructorId: The unique identifier for the participating constructor.
columns.number: The number assigned to the driver for the qualifying session.
columns.position: The starting position of the driver in the race.
columns.q1: The time taken by the driver in the first qualifying round.
columns.q2: The time taken by the driver in the second qualifying round.
columns.q3: The time taken by the driver in the third qualifying round.

qualifying.table_description: The table captures qualifying performance details of drivers in races.

columns.circuitId: The unique identifier for each racing circuit.
columns.circuitRef: The short reference name for the circuit.
columns.name: The full official name of the racing circuit.
columns.location: The specific location where the circuit is situated.
columns.country: The country where the racing circuit is located.
columns.lat: The geographical latitude of the circuit.
columns.lng: The geographical longitude of the circuit.
columns.alt: The altitude of the circuit, generally in meters.
columns.url: The web link for more information about the circuit.

circuits.table_description: The table lists details about various racing circuits.

columns.raceId: The unique identifier for each race event.
columns.year: The year when the race event took place.
columns.round: The round number of the race within the season.
columns.circuitId: The unique identifier for the associated racing circuit.
columns.name: The official name of the race event.
columns.date: The scheduled date of the race event.
columns.time: The scheduled time for the race event to start.
columns.url: The web link for more information about the race event.

races.table_description: The table records details of each race event in the season.

columns.statusId: The unique identifier for each status entry.
columns.status: The current status of a driver's race or vehicle.

status.table_description: The table records various statuses that affect race outcomes.

columns.year: The unique year of the Formula 1 racing season.
columns.url: The web link for more information about the season.

seasons.table_description: The table records details of Formula 1 racing seasons.

columns.constructorId: The unique identifier for each constructor.
columns.constructorRef: The short reference name for the constructor.
columns.name: The full official name of the constructor.
columns.nationality: The country representing the constructor's origin.
columns.url: The web link for more information about the constructor.

constructors.table_description: The table lists details about various constructors in Formula 1.

columns.constructorStandingsId: The unique identifier for each constructor standings entry.
columns.raceId: The unique identifier for the associated race event.
columns.constructorId: The unique identifier for the participating constructor.
columns.points: The total points earned by the constructor in the season.
columns.position: The finishing position of the constructor in the race.
columns.positionText: The text representation of the constructor's finishing position.
columns.wins: The total number of race wins by the constructor.

constructorStandings.table_description: The table tracks constructor standings across multiple races.

columns.resultId: The unique identifier for each race result entry.
columns.raceId: The unique identifier for the associated race event.
columns.driverId: The unique identifier for the participating driver.
columns.constructorId: The unique identifier for the participating constructor.
columns.number: The race number assigned to the driver.
columns.grid: The starting position of the driver on the grid.
columns.position: The finishing position of the driver in the race.
columns.positionText: The text representation of the driver's finishing position.
columns.positionOrder: The order of the driver based on finishing positions.
columns.points: The total points earned by the driver in the race.
columns.laps: The total number of laps completed by the driver.
columns.time: The total time taken by the driver to finish the race.
columns.milliseconds: The total race time recorded in milliseconds.
columns.fastestLap: The lap number with the fastest recorded time.
columns.rank: The rank of the driver based on their performance.
columns.fastestLapTime: The time taken to complete the fastest lap.
columns.fastestLapSpeed: The average speed during the fastest lap.
columns.statusId: The status identifier for the driver's race completion.

results.table_description: The table records results of drivers in various race events.

columns.raceId: The unique identifier for the associated race event.
columns.driverId: The unique identifier for the participating driver.
columns.stop: The sequential number of the pit stop during the race.
columns.lap: The lap number when the pit stop occurred.
columns.time: The timestamp marking when the pit stop began.
columns.duration: The total time taken to complete the pit stop.
columns.milliseconds: The total duration of the pit stop recorded in milliseconds.

pitStops.table_description: The table records pit stop details for drivers during races.

columns.raceId: The unique identifier for the associated race event.
columns.driverId: The unique identifier for the participating driver.
columns.lap: The lap number during which the time was recorded.
columns.position: The driver's position at the end of the lap.
columns.time: The time taken to complete the lap.
columns.milliseconds: The total lap time recorded in milliseconds.

lapTimes.table_description: The table tracks lap times of drivers during races.

columns.driverId: The unique identifier for each driver in the database.
columns.driverRef: The reference name used for identifying the driver.
columns.number: The race number assigned to the driver, if applicable.
columns.code: The short code used to represent the driver.
columns.forename: The first name of the driver.
columns.surname: The last name of the driver.
columns.dob: The date of birth of the driver.
columns.nationality: The nationality representing the driver's country.
columns.url: The web link for more information about the driver.

drivers.table_description: The table stores detailed information about racing drivers.
